meta.title_zh: 皮膚問題：過敏、蚊蟲叮咬

dialogue.zh:
嗨! How 可以 我 幫忙?
こんにちは! How できます 私 手伝う?

我 有 an itchy rash.
私 have an itchy rash.

哪裡 是 the rash?
どこ 私 the rash?

On my arm.
On my arm.

dialogue.text: Did it start after a bite or new soap?
dialogue.zh:
Did it start after a bite or new soap?
Did it start after a bite or new soap?

Maybe a mosquito bite.
Maybe a mosquito bite.

dialogue.text: Is the skin broken or bleeding?
dialogue.zh:
是 the skin broken or bleeding?
私 the skin broken or bleeding?

不, just red and itchy.
いいえ, just red and itchy.

任何 swelling or trouble breathing?
Any swelling or trouble breathing?

不.
いいえ.

dialogue.text: Okay. A mild anti-itch cream should help.
dialogue.zh:
好的. A mild anti-itch cream should 幫忙.
わかりました. A mild anti-itch cream should 手伝う.

太好了.
いいですね.

dialogue.text: Do you prefer cream or spray?
dialogue.zh:
你 prefer cream or spray?
Do あなた prefer cream or spray?

Cream, 請.
Cream, お願いします.

dialogue.text: Apply a thin layer twice a day.
dialogue.zh:
Apply a thin layer twice a day.
Apply a thin layer twice a day.

好的.
わかりました.

Try not to scratch it.
Try not to scratch it.

我’ll try.
私’ll try.

dialogue.text: Do you need an antihistamine tablet too?
dialogue.zh:
你 需要 an antihistamine tablet too?
Do あなた 必要 an antihistamine tablet too?

dialogue.text: Maybe. Will it make me sleepy?
dialogue.zh:
Maybe. Will it make me sleepy?
Maybe. Will it make me sleepy?

This one 是 non-drowsy.
This one 私 non-drowsy.

Perfect.
Perfect.

Take one tablet daily.
Take one tablet daily.

Got it.
Got it.

dialogue.text: If it spreads or gets worse, see a doctor.
dialogue.zh:
If it spreads or gets worse, see a doctor.
If it spreads or gets worse, see a doctor.

好的.
わかりました.

dialogue.text: Do you want a small tube or a large tube?
dialogue.zh:
你 想要 a 小 tube or a 大 tube?
Do あなた want a スモール tube or a ラージ tube?

小 是 fine.
スモール 私 fine.

Alright, 我’ll ring it up.
Alright, 私’ll ring it up.

謝謝.
ありがとう.
